post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, August 13
post.Content:
A quiet week in the land of Java desktop, with only a few links to share. Nonetheless, I hope you all enjoy :-)

  • Pedro DV has more progress on his fluent design style for JavaFX, this week adding a Toggle Switch control to the offering.
  • Andres Almiray has two posts. Firstly, a 'Griffon Mythbusters' post, and secondly a new release of DesktopPaneFX.
